about_the_game:
This is an outfit set for Loid, Anya, Yor, and Bond to use in SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories.

The Thrilling Outfit Pack:
• Fancy Set
- Loid's Fancy Tuxedo
- Anya and Yor's Fancy Dress
- Bond's Pearl Bow
• Work & Undercover Set
- Loid's White Coat
- Anya's Undercover Suit, Undercover Bandana, and Undercover Sunglasses
- Yor's Uniform
- Bond's Goggles
• In-Game Bonus Items:
- Mr. Chimera Statue (Earn 2x Eurekas)
- 10,000 PP

*Please note that contents are included in the Deluxe Edition and Deluxe Outing Pack. Please be mindful of duplicate purchases.
*Custom outfits will not be displayed during certain minigames and cutscenes.
